titleStmt.title: A fraction in the assembly: or the synod in armes being a punctuall relation of their set meeting, upon the 25. of Aprill in this present year of our computation 1648 at a tavern in London, where the purposes of those reverend fathers, were piously discovered by themselves, in a mutuall conference by the strength of a dinner, in the truth of wine: their disagreement, upon the question: their falling out upon that; and how they were parted: with other mixtures of sad and merry accidents being all passages very remarkeable: and curious observations, which the author, as a generall well-wisher, delivers heer to the worlds view - and he hopes satisfaction.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
